channel.title: Mage arena
channel.description:
Is there a way that I can remove ALL NPC's from the Mage Arena and do the following:
Player types ::deathmatch - teleports them to the arena with NO way out (teleblocked) except the lever. In ::deathmatch, ::bank is disabled.
Is that possible, if so can someone explain how I could do that?

item.title: Mage arena
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

Copy and paste them all on your first client.java line then type

---------------

?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kaldo Kaldo
item.description:
@Kaldo wrote:

What if I want them somewhere else; I mean I don’t want them there right now, but maybe later down the track?

Read full topic

item.title: Mage arena
item.dc:creator: @3_hit_pure 3 hit pure
item.description:
@3_hit_pure wrote:

Yes you can remove the from mage arena, just go to autospawn.cfg and search for the npc id and delete them from there and then compile and they shouldn’ appear.

Read full topic

item.title: Mage arena
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

[quote=“Zenzie, post:5, topic:80852”]NO way out (teleblocked) except the lever.

Well goodluck with that one ;D[/quote]You can do that, but you need to change every tele command/spell so that they won’t work in the wanted area. For example a command like this, (this might be wrong) if(command.startsWith("deathmatch")) if(teleblock == 0){ teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; else if(teleblock >= 1){ sendMessage("You can't teleport, you have been teleblocked!"); } Try that, tell me if it works.

EDIT: Like I said, that won’t work if there’s commands/spells that allow you to teleport even if you’re teleblocked.

Read full topic

item.title: Mage arena
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

NO way out (teleblocked) except the lever.

Well goodluck with that one ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Mage arena
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

I can help you with the ::bank. I’ll post it in a minute.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2007, 06:03:49 AM[/size][hr] else if (command.startsWith("bank")) if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot bank in the wildy!"); } else { openUpBank(); }

Read full topic
